Uses of Class
kalahariBackendStateless.KalahariFieldsMove

  • Packages that use KalahariFieldsMove 
    Package Description
    kalahariBackendStateless  
    kalahariMinMax  

    • Uses of KalahariFieldsMove in kalahariBackendStateless

      Methods in kalahariBackendStateless that return KalahariFieldsMove 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      KalahariFieldsMove KalahariGameStateless.performMove(KalahariFieldsMove selectedMove)
      Performs a players move: takes all tokens/mussels from the field the player chose to draw from (KalahariFieldsMove private variable fieldToMove) and spreads content to subsequent fields by adding one token/mussel to each.
      Methods in kalahariBackendStateless with parameters of type KalahariFieldsMove 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean KalahariFieldsMove.equals(KalahariFieldsMove other)
      equals method for objects of KalahariFieldsMove
      KalahariFieldsMove KalahariGameStateless.performMove(KalahariFieldsMove selectedMove)
      Performs a players move: takes all tokens/mussels from the field the player chose to draw from (KalahariFieldsMove private variable fieldToMove) and spreads content to subsequent fields by adding one token/mussel to each.

    • Uses of KalahariFieldsMove in kalahariMinMax

      Methods in kalahariMinMax with parameters of type KalahariFieldsMove 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      KalahariMoveAndResult KalahariMinMax.getRecommendedMove(KalahariFieldsMove initialSituation, int computerPlayer, int playerToDraw, int depth, int alpha, int beta)
      Given a dedicated situation this method returns a recommended move that was computed with a MinMax Algorithm developed for zero-sum games (see e.g. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minimax).
